org.pac4j.core.context
Class BaseResponseContext

java.lang.Object
  org.pac4j.core.context.BaseResponseContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
J2ERequestContext
public abstract class BaseResponseContext
extends Object
implements WebContext

This class implements the methods related to the response as a POJO.

Since:
1.4.0
Author:
Jerome Leleu
